transforms.code:
projectNames = backup.util.getProjectNames()
	
	return [{'label':name, 'value':name} for name in projectNames]

tooltip.text: Download the selected resources to file.
Add the selected resources to the project folder.

config.script:
instances = []
	
	tagProvider = self.session.custom.tagProvider
	
	defaultValue = False
	
	# ----------------  Update with all project names ----------------------
#	projectNames = backup.util.getProjectNames()
#	projectOptions = []
#	for name in projectNames:
#		projectOptions.append({'label':name, 'value':True, 'viewPath':'Backup Restore/Components/Checkbox Option'})
#		
#		
#	self.props.instances[1].options = projectOptions	


	# ----------------  Update with all root tag paths ----------------------
	#tagProviders = backup.util.getTagProviders()
	rootTagPaths = system.tag.readBlocking(tagProvider + "RapidDev/Backup Restore/Settings/rootTagPaths")[0].value

	tagPathOptions = []
	for tagPath in rootTagPaths:
	
		tagPathOptions.append({'label':tagPath, 'value':defaultValue, 'viewPath':'Backup Restore/Components/Checkbox Option'})
	
	instances.append({'type': 'tags', 'options': tagPathOptions})
		

	
	
	# ----------------  Update with database tables  ----------------------
	
	databaseTables = system.tag.readBlocking(self.session.custom.tagProvider + "RapidDev/Backup Restore/Settings/databaseTables")[0].value
	
	tableOptions = []
	for row in range(databaseTables.getRowCount()):
		database = databaseTables.getValueAt(row,'Database')
		translator = databaseTables.getValueAt(row,'Translator')
		table = databaseTables.getValueAt(row,'Table')
		tableOptions.append({'label':'[' + database + ']' + table, 'value':defaultValue, 'viewPath':'Backup Restore/Components/Checkbox Option'})
		
	instances.append({'type': 'tables', 'options': tableOptions})
	
	# ----------------  Update with all icons ----------------------	
#	themeNames = backup.util.getThemeNames()

	themes = system.tag.readBlocking(self.session.custom.tagProvider + "RapidDev/Backup Restore/Settings/themes")[0].value

	themeOptions = []
	for theme in themes:
		themeOptions.append({'label':theme, 'value':defaultValue, 'viewPath':'Backup Restore/Components/Checkbox Option'})
		
	instances.append({'type': 'themes', 'options': themeOptions})
	
	# ----------------  Update with all icons ----------------------	

	icons = system.tag.readBlocking(self.session.custom.tagProvider + "RapidDev/Backup Restore/Settings/icons")[0].value

	iconOptions = []
	for icon in icons:
		iconOptions.append({'label':icon, 'value':defaultValue, 'viewPath':'Backup Restore/Components/Checkbox Option'})
		
	instances.append({'type': 'icons', 'options': iconOptions})




	self.getChild("FlexRepeater").props.instances = instances

transforms.code:
projectNames = backup.util.getProjectNames()
	
	return [{'label':name, 'value':name} for name in projectNames]

tooltip.text: Update Ignition with the selected resources.

config.script:
import time
	
	dateTime = system.date.format(system.date.now(),"yyyy-MM-dd-HHmmss")	
	tempLocation = settings.getValue('Global','serverTempSaveLocation')
	fileName = 'upload_' + dateTime + '_' + event.file.name
	
	event.file.copyTo(tempLocation + '/' + fileName)
	
	print 'fileName: ', fileName
	backup.util.unZipTempFile(fileName)
